verbs.description: [ARG1: French President Emmanuel Macron] [V: came] [ARG4: to the White House] [ARGM-PRP: for a state visit with President Donald Trump] . First ladies Melania Trump and Brigitte Macron were at t
French President Emmanuel Macron came to the White House for a state visit with President Donald Trump . [ARGM-TMP: First] [ARG1: ladies Melania Trump and Brigitte Macron] [V: were] [ARG2: at t]
